abstract.t: The PANA Base protocol defines a method for carrying EAP messageexchanges over UDP/IP. This means that the PANA Client (PaC) isrequired to know the IP address of the PANA Authentication Agent(PAA). In many cases, this is not convinient or practical. Thisdocument proposes a simple PAA discovery scheme that allows the PaCto determine the PAA IP address without any modification to the baseprotocol messages or exchange sequence.
